info.description: A workout tracking web application for personal use (or family, friends), geared towards running and other GPX-based activities
info.title: Workout Tracker

get.summary: List the daily measurements of the current user

parameters.description: Number of measurements to return; default 50; -1 is no limit
parameters.name: limit

post.summary: Update the daily measurement of the current user

parameters.description: Program that generates the workout file
parameters.name: program

get.summary: List all records of the current user for the specified workout type
List all statistics of the current user
List all totals of the current user for the specified workout type
Show the information of the owner of the API key
List all workouts of the current user
List the calendar events of all workouts of the current user

parameters.description: Start date of the calendar view
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: End date of the calendar view
parameters.name: end

get.summary: Get all information about a workout
Break down a workdown per units

height.description: The height of the user, in centimeter

height_unit.description: The unit of the height (or the user's preferred unit)

weight.description: The weight of the user, in kilograms

weight_unit.description: The unit of the weight (or the user's preferred unit)

counter.description: Counter of this item in the list of items

firstPoint.description: First GPS point in this item

isBest.description: Whether this item is the best of the list

isWorst.description: Whether this item is the worst of the list

lastPoint.description: Last GPS point in this item

localAverageSpeed.description: The average speed in the bucket, localized

localCadence.description: The starting cadence in the bucket, localized

localDistance.description: The total distance in the bucket, localized

localElevation.description: The starting elevation in the bucket, localized

localHeartRate.description: The starting heart rate in the bucket, localized

localTotalDistance.description: Total distance in all items up to and including this item

totalDistance.description: Total distance in all items up to and including this item

totalDuration.description: Total duration in all items up to and including this item

totalDurationSeconds.description: The total duration in the bucket, in seconds

unitCount.description: Count of the unit per item

averageSpeed.description: The average speed in the bucket

averageSpeedNoPause.description: The average speed without pause in the bucket

distance.description: The total distance in the bucket

duration.description: The total duration in the bucket

durationSeconds.description: The total duration in the bucket, in seconds

localAverageSpeed.description: The average speed in the bucket, localized

localAverageSpeedNoPause.description: The average speed without pause in the bucket, localized

localDistance.description: The total distance in the bucket, localized

localDuration.description: The total duration in the bucket, localized

localMaxSpeed.description: The max speed in the bucket, localized

localUp.description: The total up elevation in the bucket, localized

maxSpeed.description: The max speed in the bucket

up.description: The total up elevation in the bucket

workouts.description: The number of workouts in the bucket

id.description: The workout ID of the record

default_for.description: Which workout types to add this equipment by default

userID.description: The ID of the user who owns the workout

id.description: The workout ID of the record

addressString.description: The generic location of the workout

averageSpeedNoPause.description: The average speed of the workout without pausing

center.description: The center of the workout (in coordinates)

creator.description: The tool that created this workout

maxElevation.description: The maximum elevation of the workout

maxSpeed.description: The maximum speed of the workout

minElevation.description: The minimum elevation of the workout

pauseDuration.description: The total pause duration of the workout

start.description: The start time of the workout

stop.description: The stop time of the workout

totalDistance.description: The total distance of the workout

totalDown.description: The total distance down of the workout

totalDuration.description: The total duration of the workout

totalRepetitions.description: The number of repetitions of the workout

totalUp.description: The total distance up of the workout

workoutID.description: The workout this data belongs to

mapDataID.description: The ID of the map data these details belong to

points.description: The GPS points of the workout

distance.description: The distance from the previous point

duration.description: The duration from the previous point

time.description: The time the point was recorded

totalDistance.description: The total distance of the workout up to this point

totalDuration.description: The total duration of the workout up to this point

height.description: The height of the user, in centimeter

userID.description: The ID of the user who owns the workout

weight.description: The weight of the user, in kilograms

api_active.description: Whether the user's API key is active

auto_import_directory.description: The user's preferred directory for auto-import

prefer_full_date.description: Whether to show full dates in the workout details

socials_disabled.description: Whether social sharing buttons are disabled when viewing a workout

totals_show.description: What workout type of totals to show

userID.description: The ID of the user who owns this profile

addressString.description: The generic location of the workout

bidirectional.description: Whether the route segment is bidirectional

center.description: The center of the workout (in coordinates)

circular.description: Whether the route segment is circular

dirty.description: Whether the route segment should be recalculated

maxElevation.description: The maximum elevation of the workout

minElevation.description: The minimum elevation of the workout

notes.description: The notes associated with the workout, in markdown

points.description: The GPS points of the workout

routeSegmentMatches.description: The matches of the route segment

totalDistance.description: The total distance of the workout

totalDown.description: The total distance down of the workout

totalUp.description: The total distance up of the workout

distance.description: The total distance of the route segment for this workout

duration.description: The total duration of the route segment for this workout

firstID.description: The index of the first point of the route

lastID.description: The index of the last point of the route

routeSegmentID.description: The ID of the route segment

bucketFormat.description: The bucket format in strftime format

admin.description: Whether the user is an admin

lastVersion.description: Which version of the app the user has last seen and acknowledged

data.description: The map data associated with the workout

date.description: The timestamp the workout was recorded

dirty.description: Whether the workout has been modified and the details should be re-rendered

equipment.description: Which equipment is used for this workout

gpx.description: The file data associated with the workout

notes.description: The notes associated with the workout, in markdown

publicUUID.description: UUID to publicly share a workout - this UUID can be rotated

user.description: The user who owns the workout

userID.description: The ID of the user who owns the workout

active.description: Whether there is any data in the record

averageSpeed.description: The record with the maximum average speed

distance.description: The record with the maximum distance

duration.description: The record with the maximum duration
